com.superduckinvaders.game.objective

Class AnimatedText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.superduckinvaders.game.objective.AnimatedText

  • public class AnimatedText
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the floating text which displays upon killing an enemy or gaining some score.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color colour
      The colour of the animated text.
      private float currentX
      The current positions x and y of the animated text.
      private float currentY
      The current positions x and y of the animated text.
      private float displayTimer
      The timer which controls how long the text should animate and be displayed for.
      private static float LIFETIME
      Time the text will be on the screen in seconds
      private static float MOVEMENT_AMOUNT
      Value to control how much the text moves upwards over its lifetime
      private java.lang.String text
      The text to animate and display.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public boolean draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch spriteBatch,
                    float delta)
        Draws the animated text with correct offset position on the SpriteBatch
        Parameters:
        spriteBatch - The SpriteBatch to draw to
        delta - Time since the last draw call
        Returns:
        true if text has time remaining, false otherwise
